titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation whereas His Majesty hath been informed that great numbers of papists and other disaffected persons, who disown His Majesties government, have lately resorted to and assembled in the cities of London and Westminster ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first lines of text.
"Given at our court at Kensington the second day of March, 1698. In the eleventh year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
